sources.title: Law Of The Rio Grande (1931)
sources.description: An engaged woman (Betty Mack) causes a stir among outlaws (Bob Custer, Edmund Cobb).

sources.title: Law of the Rio Grande
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Law of the Rio Grande (1931) BOB CUSTER
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Custer, Betty Mack, Carlton S. King 
Director: Forrest Sheldon

Escaping from the Sheriff, Jim and Cookie decide to go straight. But when they meet their old cohort, The Blanco Kid, he tells their new boss they are outlaws and they are in trouble again.

metadata.Plot: Escaping from the Sheriff, Jim and Cookie decide to go straight. But when they meet their old cohort, The Blanco Kid, he tells their new boss they are outlaws and they are in trouble again.
metadata.Actors: Bob Custer, Betty Mack, Carlton S. King
